extension.summary: "A bare simple addon for streaming openings.moe on kodi, allows fetching the current stream and few random streams. Also allows searching for a particular opening or ending"
extension.description: "Back in April 2015, quad was bored and made a site that picked a random anime opening from a folder. He later put it on a web server and from there it just somehow took off. Now we serve thousands of high quality anime openings and endings. Quality over quantity is the game. - Quad (The guy who made the first version of the site), Streams quality ops and eds"
